subject: Attention, Nellie/ Your urgent reply is highly needed immediately. to claim your approved $41.5m Dollars as to proof that you are strong and alive to reclaim your funds as to go ahead to reconfirm to me your full information immediately
body:
Attention, My dear good friend,  Nellie

,Thanks for your reply  and go ahead to reconfirm  to us your full
information as to enable us proceed to start processing your approved
$35.5m Dollars  that you are alive thanks be to God Almighty so we have to
work together to enable you receive this approved  41.5m Dollars which is
much  ready for you to reclaimed and receive it  on before next weekend as
you will promise to follow my  instructions till you receive this  approved
funds and for your information government has declared Mr. Heinz-Kurt
Weltner  wanted  through all the security agents around the world.As i am
very sorry to reply very late due to official duty  to Germany.

 please forward to us all the related Benefactors particulars including your
Telephone number, current contact address  and your bank account
information where  your approved sum of $41 .5 Dollars will be released
into  your bank account. and promise to keep to my instructions  as you
will not contact any persons or group of offices as regards to this
transaction without telling me first to avoid getting  into the hands of
scammers.

 WAITING TO HEAR FROM YOU TODAY.

Thanks for your Cooperation
Sincerely,
Dr Marsh David Sr.

 Your Contact Address
